articles.title: Tristan Rogers, who played super spy Robert Scorpio on ‘General Hospital,’ has died at 79 - AP News
articles.description: Tristan Rogers, known for his role as Robert Scorpio on “General Hospital,” has died. He was 79. Rogers first appeared on the show in 1980 and became a beloved character. Born in Melbourne, Australia, he initially pursued music before turning to acting. He mo…
